User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, typically the Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the user.

teacherType.description: Specifies the management focus for a teacher.

isHomeTutor.description: Indicates if the teacher is approved to be a home tutor.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

coins.description: The number of coins the user has earned.

streak.description: The user's current daily login streak.

lastLoginDate.description: The date of the user's last login, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

subject.description: The subject taught by the teacher.

coachingCenterName.description: The name of the teacher's coaching center.

whatsappNumber.description: The teacher's WhatsApp number for contact.

fee.description: The fee structure for the teacher's classes.

class.description: The class or grade the student is in.

referralCode.description: A unique code for this user to refer others.

referredBy.description: The referral code of the user who referred this user.

Batch.title: Batch
Batch.description: Represents a batch created by a teacher.

teacherId.description: The UID of the teacher who created the batch.

code.description: A unique, shareable code for students to join the batch.

approvedStudents.description: List of UIDs of students approved for this batch.

Enrollment.title: Enrollment
Enrollment.description: Represents a student's enrollment request for a teacher's batch.

teacherName.description: The name of the teacher for the batch.

approvedAt.description: The date and time when the enrollment was approved.

StudyMaterial.title: Study Material
StudyMaterial.description: Represents study material uploaded by a teacher for a batch.

FreeMaterial.title: Free Material
FreeMaterial.description: Represents free study material uploaded by an admin, available to all students.

category.description: The category of the study material.

ShopItem.title: Shop Item
ShopItem.description: Represents an item available for purchase in the shop, managed by admins.

imageName.description: The file name of the image in storage, for deletion purposes.

purchaseUrl.description: External link to purchase the item.

HomeBooking.title: Home Booking
HomeBooking.description: Represents a booking for a home teacher, managed by admins.

studentId.description: The UID of the student who made the booking.

mobileNumber.description: The contact mobile number for the booking.

address.description: The address where home tuition is required.

HomeTutorApplication.title: Home Tutor Application
HomeTutorApplication.description: Represents a teacher's application to be listed as a home tutor.

processedAt.description: The date the application was approved or rejected.

Activity.title: Activity
Activity.description: Represents a logged action within a batch, like an upload or schedule change.

message.description: A human-readable message describing the activity.

AdminActivity.title: Admin Activity
AdminActivity.description: Represents a logged action performed by an admin user.

adminId.description: The UID of the admin who performed the action.

action.description: A human-readable description of the action taken.

targetId.description: The ID of the document or entity that was affected.

Announcement.title: Announcement
Announcement.description: Represents a global announcement sent by an admin.

Fee.title: Fee
Fee.description: Represents a student's monthly fee payment status for a batch.

Test.title: Test
Test.description: Represents a test created by a teacher for a batch.

TestResult.title: Test Result
TestResult.description: Represents a student's marks for a specific test.

School.title: School
School.description: Represents a school managed by a principal user. The principal can directly add and manage teachers, classes, and students within the school document.

address.description: The physical address of the school.

principalId.description: The UID of the user who is the principal of the school.

code.description: A unique, shareable code for other teachers to join the school staff.

academicYear.description: The current academic year session, e.g., '2024-2025'.

teacherIds.description: List of UIDs of teachers who are part of this school's staff. Managed by the principal.

classes.description: List of classes in the school, managed by the principal.

id.description: Unique ID for the class (e.g., generated with nanoid).

name.description: The name of the class, e.g., 'Class 10' or '12th Grade'.

section.description: The section of the class, e.g., 'A', 'B', 'Science'.

teacherId.description: The UID of the teacher assigned to the class.

teacherName.description: The name of the teacher assigned to the class.

students.description: List of students enrolled in this class, directly added by the principal.

id.description: Unique ID for the student entry.

rollNumber.description: The student's roll number in the class.

admissionDate.description: The date the student was admitted.

Complaint.title: Complaint
Complaint.description: Represents a support complaint or issue filed by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who filed the complaint.

userRole.description: The role of the user (student, teacher).

subject.description: The subject or title of the complaint.

message.description: The detailed message of the complaint.

status.description: The current status of the complaint.

/enrollments/{enrollmentId}.description: Stores student enrollment requests for batches.

/batches/{batchId}/materials/{materialId.description: Stores study materials for a specific batch.

/freeMaterials/{materialId}.description: Stores free study materials uploaded by admins, accessible to all students.

/shopItems/{itemId}.description: Stores items available in the shop, managed by admins.

/homeBookings/{bookingId}.description: Stores home teacher booking requests managed by admins.

/homeTutorApplications/{applicationId}.description: Stores applications from teachers to become home tutors.

/batches/{batchId}/activity/{activityId}.description: Stores a log of recent activities for a batch.

/announcements/{announcementId}.description: Stores global announcements sent by the admin.

/batches/{batchId}/tests/{testId}.description: Stores tests for a specific batch.

/fees/{feeId}.description: Stores monthly fee records for students in batches.

/schools/{schoolId}.description: Stores schools created and managed by principals.

/adminActivities/{activityId}.description: Stores a log of all actions performed by administrators.
